From: 
'-
To: MonteII Figgins 
Cc: 
( 
Subject: U.S. v. Thomas, No. 19 Cr. 830 - Discovery Production 
Date: Tue, 31 Dec 2019 17:31:41 +0000 
Attachments: 2019.12.3 I_Thomas_Discovery_Letter -_Production_l.pdf; SDNY_00008123 JAEO).pdf 
Counsel: 
Please find attached a letter regarding the Government's discovery production in this case. We are sending a hard drive 
containing the discovery materials to you. The password on the drive is Additionally, please find 
attached one additional page of discovery, which has been marked attorney's eyes only. Please contact us with any 
questions. Thank you. 
Regards, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
United States Attorney's Office 
Southern District of New York 
One St. Andrew's Plaza 
New York. New York 10007 
EFTA00025238
